text.Aimedis_making_health_secure: Aimedis - making e-health secure, affordable and accessible. Worldwide.

text.Aimedis_connects_me_with_my: Aimedis connects me with my patients all around the clock and allows me to support them even after my practice times are over. This gives real value to our medical treatments.
text.Aimedis_supports_patients_doctors: Aimedis supports patients and doctors by making data available quickly and reliable which results in a quick, easy and efficient treatment.

text.Discover_the_best: Discover the best features for you.
text.Aimedis_has_been_developed: Aimedis has been developed by doctors for patients, doctors and hospitals - designed to give patients the complete control over their health data and support.
text.Connect_your_trackers: Connect your trackers and IoT devices
text.eAppointment_module_for: eAppointment module for on- and offlne appointments

text.also_unexperienced_patients: also for unexperienced patients simple & fast
text.Who_gets_most_out: Who gets the most out of Aimedis
text.Support_your_customers: Support your customers 24/7 worldwide while reducing costs, offering unique services and generating trust.
text.Connect_yourself_flawlessly: Connect yourself flawlessly to patients, the ambulantory sector, to caregivers and the industry to improve outcomes and offer unique services.
text.Connect_patients_worldwide: Connect to patients worldwide and get access to a vast amount of potential trial participants.
text.Access_the_patients_data: Access the patients‘ data in the moment you need. Save time and lives while having all the information at hand.
text.Improve_your_patient_contact: Improve your patient contact and support by giving patients the option to offer you access to crucial information and receive prescriptions online, saved on the Aimedis blockchain.
text.Enhance_local_nationwide: Enhance local and nationwide healthcare systems by connecting and empowering patients and caregivers while generating trust using the Aimedis blockchain.
text.Life_saving_information: Life saving information when you need it
text.A_new_kind_of_healthcare: A new kind of healthcare – bordeless & effective
text.Specialists_Healthcare_Staff: Specialists in Healthcare Staff & HR Planning
text.A_free_ICU_bed: A free ICU bed is just one click away!
text.QM_and_certification_level: QM and certification on a new level
text.With_experts_healthcare_IT: With experts in healthcare, IT security and infrastructure, blockchain and finance Aimedis Consult empowers you to challenge the future of healthcare and protect your patients and your institution.
text.Aimedis_Consult_also_supports: Aimedis Consult also supports you in medical equipment.
text.Find_new_perspectives_with_Aimedis: Find new perspectives with Aimedis Staff. We recruit staff for the entire healthcare sector around the world.
text.you_are_need_highly_skilled: If you are in need of highly skilled medical staff, do not hesitate to contact us. CONTACT US NOW
text.With_this_Aimedis_module: With this Aimedis module you can find free ICU beds in seconds and see the ICU situation practically and in real time. This avoids the long, exhausting and for the patient inacceptable time it takes to find a free ICU bed when in a critical situation.
text.The_Aimedis_QM_module_as_part: The Aimedis QM module as part of the Aimedis medical ecosystem offers hospitals, practices, pharmaceutical companies, research facilities and pharmacies the option to run their staff through any certification by the grant maker all the required documents, procedure and guidelines in real time and in a direct communication with auditors and team leaders.
text.AIMEDIS_QM_FINALLY_OFFERS: Aimedis QM finally offers the possibility of any standardizations such as ISO 9001, ktq, QEP, KPQM and hygiene manuals and make them available on the web as well as on all iOS and Android devices.
text.You_manage_your_QM_system: You manage your QM system lean, efficient and intuitive for each employee. You define the rights – from the creation to the approval to the “sign off” by the employees.
text.Modeling_analogous_explorer_tree: Modeling – analogous to the explorer tree
text.Edit_before_your_usual_office: Edit – as before in your usual office environment
text.Increase_efficiency_productivity: Increase efficiency and productivity – physical presence in collecting the signatures and nervous stress are eliminated
text.Revision_levels_safe: Revision levels - safe and consistent tracking
text.Permeability_on_smartphone: Permeability – on smartphone, iPad or computer-full visibility
text.Aimedis_combines_your_health_data: Aimedis combines your health data, onliner prescriptions, video consultation with doctors and psychologists, information, medical hardware, your smart devices, and more on a single platform on your PC, your smartphone or your tablet, anytime, worldwide and in multiple languages.

text.If_you_have_question_experiencing: If you have a question or are experiencing issues with Aimedis, you can send us a Support Message and we will back to you ASAP
text.error_msgAddress: An e-mail address must contain single @
text.The_Aimedis_ERC20_based_digital: The Aimedis ERC20 based digital asset (AIM) can already be used to buy medical services inside the Aimedis ecosystems and the Aimedis second opinion portal. We accept the token at a value of 0,15 USD per AIM and give the token holder the possibility to buy the services including videochat with doctors, prescriptions and second opinions with a discount compared to fiat money or other cryptocurrency payments. A cash payout of the tokens is not possible but you can sell the token on one of our partner exchanges right after listing.
text.This_is_graph_that_shows: This is a graph that shows how the Aimedis blockchain works:
text.Whitepaper_for_Aimedis_digital: Whitepaper for the Aimedis digital asset (AIM)
text.Find_the_technical_specifications: Find the technical specifications, details of our dual blockchain model, the business model and more inside this document. You can download it in the language of your choice.
text.This_AIM_digital_asset_sale: This is the AIM digital asset sale agreement, including restricted countries and a disclaimer.
text.With_Aimedis_launch_AIMsocial: With Aimedis V2 we launch AIMsocial, the first decentralized and incentiviced social medical network. AIMsocial revolutionizes the way patients communicate and support their way to healthyness and well-being. With the release the AIM digital asset will give patients and caregivers the possibility to get paid for their efforts and work inside the network, because we believe that helping others must be incentivised.
text.Aimedis_supports_fight: Aimedis supports the fight against COVID-19.
text.For_questions_donot_hesitate: For questions do not hesitate to contact us via
text.No_doubt_Aimedis_contributes: No doubt Aimedis contribute to the actual situation and faces the problems patients and professional healthcare workers share around the globe. That is why we offer free video consultations and advisory in English and German language.
text.Just_register_withus_and_send: Just register with us and send us a message to get to know more.
text.Besides_the_Aimedis_platform_offers: Besides the Aimedis platform offers a COVID-19 diary and tools for patients and healthcare professionals plus the latest ICD catalogue supporting the ICD 10 code U07.1 (COVID-19 virus identified) and U07.2 (suspected to have the covid-19, virus not identified) on the professional side.
text.Next_Aimedis_has_dense_network: Next Aimedis has a dense network of medical product suppliers. We organist ear loop masks, FFP2 and FFP3 masks, gloves, glasses or protective suits at reasonable prices form verified suppliers

text.You_wish_place_an_Order: If You wish to place an Order for Goods available on the Service, you may be asked to supply certain information relevant to Your order including, without limitation, Your name, Your email, Your phone number, Your credit card number, the expiration date of Your credit card, your billing address, and your shipping information.

text.Our_Returns_Policy_forms: Our Returns Policy forms a part of these Terms and Conditions. Please read our Returns Policy to learn more about your right to cancel Your Order.
text.Your_right_cancel_an_Order: Your right to cancel an Order only applies to Goods that are returned in the same condition as you received them. You should also include all of the products instructions, documents and wrappings. Goods that are damaged or not in the same condition as you received them or which are worn simply beyond opening the original packaging will not be refunded. You should therefore take reasonable care of the purchased Goods while they are in Your possession.
text.We_will_reimburse_You: We will reimburse you no later than 14 days from the day on which we receive the returned Goods. We will use the same means of payment as You used for the Order, and You will not incur any fees for such reimbursement.
text.You_will_not_have_any: You will not have any right to cancel an Order for the supply of any of the following Goods:

It refers to third-party companies or individuals employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used. text.For_the_purpose_the_ccpa: for the purpose of the CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act), means a natural person who is a California resident. A resident, as defined in the law, includes (1) every individual who is in the USA for other than a temporary or transitory purpose, and (2) every individual who is domiciled in the USA who is outside the USA for a temporary or transitory purpose.

text.supply_Goods_which: usambazaji wa Bidhaa ambayo ni, baada ya kujifungua, kwa mujibu wa asili yao, yali kuchanganywa na vitu vingine.
text.We_reserve_right_refuse: Tuna haki ya kukataa faida ya bidhaa yoyote kwamba hana kukutana juu ya kurudi katika hali ya busara yetu pekee.
text.Only_regular_priced_Goods: Ni mara kwa mara ya bei ya Bidhaa zinaweza kufidiwa. Kwa bahati mbaya, Bidhaa juu ya kuuza haiwezi kufidiwa. Kutengwa hii inaweza si kuomba Kwenu kama si inaruhusiwa na sheria husika.
text.responsible_for_the_cost: Wewe ni kuwajibika kwa ajili ya gharama na hatari ya kurudi Bidhaa kwa Sisi. Unapaswa kutuma Bidhaa kwa anwani ifuatayo:
text.held_responsible_for_Goods: hatuwezi kuwajibika kwa ajili ya Bidhaa kuharibiwa au kupotea katika kurudi usafirishaji. Kwa hiyo, Sisi kupendekeza bima na trackable huduma ya barua pepe. Sisi ni uwezo wa kutoa marejesho ya kodi bila risiti halisi ya Bidhaa au ushahidi wa kupokea utoaji wa kurudi.
text.exchange_product_same: Kama wewe haja ya kubadilishana bidhaa kwa ajili hiyo hiyo moja, wasiliana nasi. Tafadhali kumbuka kwamba Sisi tu kuchukua nafasi ya Bidhaa wewe kupokea mbovu au kuharibiwa.
text.Goods_were_marked: Kama Bidhaa walikuwa alama kama zawadi wakati kununuliwa na kisha kusafirishwa moja kwa moja na wewe, Wewe'll kupokea zawadi ya mikopo kwa ajili ya thamani ya kurudi yako. Mara moja akarudi bidhaa ni kupokea, cheti zawadi itakuwa barua pepe na Wewe.
text.marked_gift_when: Kama Bidhaa walikuwa't alama kama zawadi wakati kununuliwa, au mtoaji zawadi walikuwa na Utaratibu kusafirishwa kwa wenyewe nitakupa baadaye, Sisi kutuma refund kwa mtoaji zawadi.
text.questions_about_our: Kama una maswali yoyote kuhusu wetu Anarudi na Fidia ya Faragha, tafadhali wasiliana nasi:
text.words_which_the_initial: maneno ya barua ya awali ni mtaji na maana defined chini ya masharti yafuatayo.
text.same_meaning_regardless: maelezo yafuatayo yatakuwa na maana sawa bila kujali kama wao kuonekana katika umoja au katika wingi.
text.individual_accessing_using: ina maana ya mtu kupata au kutumia Huduma, au kampuni, au mengine ya kisheria kwa niaba ya ambayo kama mtu binafsi ni kupata au kutumia Huduma, kama husika.
text.refers_Aimedis_BV_Sint: (inajulikana kama ama “Kampuni”, “Sisi”, “Sisi” au “Yetu” katika Mkataba huu) inahusu Aimedis B. V., Sint Michaelstraat 4, 5935 BL Steyl, Uholanzi.
text.App_the_Website: inahusu Maombi au Tovuti au wote wawili.
text.means_software_program_provide: ina maana ya mpango wa programu zinazotolewa na Kampuni kupakuliwa na Wewe juu ya yoyote kifaa elektroniki, jina lake Aimedis
text.The_information_contained: habari zilizomo kwenye Huduma ni kwa ujumla madhumuni ya habari tu.
text.The_Company_assumes: Kampuni hatuwajibiki kwa makosa au omissions katika yaliyomo ya Huduma.
text.In_event_shall_Company: Katika tukio hilo hakuna mtu Kampuni hawahusiki kwa yoyote maalum, moja kwa moja, moja kwa moja, madhara, au ya bahati mbaya au uharibifu yoyote ile, iwe katika hatua ya mkataba, uzembe au nyingine tort, unaojitokeza au katika uhusiano na matumizi ya Huduma au ya yaliyomo ya Huduma. Kampuni ina haki ya kufanya nyongeza, kufutwa, au marekebisho yaliyomo kwenye Huduma wakati wowote bila taarifa kabla ya.
text.The_Company_warrant: Kampuni haina uthibitisho kwamba Huduma ni ya bure ya virusi au madhara mengine vipengele.
text.information_about_health: taarifa kuhusu afya zinazotolewa na Huduma ni si nia ya kutambua, kutibu, kutibu au kuzuia ugonjwa huo. Bidhaa, huduma, habari, na bidhaa nyingine zinazotolewa na Huduma, ikiwa ni pamoja na taarifa kuunganisha na tovuti ya tatu chama ni zinazotolewa kwa ajili ya madhumuni ya habari tu.
text.Information_offered_by: Habari inayotolewa na Huduma ni si kina na haina cover yote ya magonjwa, maradhi, hali ya kimwili au matibabu yao.
text.Individuals_are_different: Watu ni tofauti na inaweza kuguswa tofauti na bidhaa mbalimbali. Maoni yaliyotolewa juu ya Huduma kwa wafanyakazi au watumiaji wengine ni madhubuti yao wenyewe binafsi na maoni yaliyotolewa katika yao wenyewe binafsi uwezo na si madai yaliyotolewa na Kampuni wala wao kuwakilisha msimamo au mtazamo wa Kampuni.
text.Company_liable_any: Kampuni ni si yeye binafsi kwa yoyote ya taarifa zinazotolewa na Huduma kuhusiana na mapendekezo kuhusu virutubisho kwa ajili ya yoyote ya afya madhumuni.
text.Company_makes_no_guarantee: Kampuni hufanya hakuna dhamana au udhamini kwa heshima na bidhaa au huduma yoyote ya kuuzwa. Kampuni si kuwajibika kwa uharibifu wowote kwa ajili ya habari au huduma zinazotolewa hata kama Kampuni imekuwa wanashauriwa ya uwezekano wa uharibifu.
text.Service_can_offer_health: Huduma inaweza kutoa afya, fitness na lishe habari ikiwa ni pamoja na, bila ya juu, ushauri na mapendekezo, kwamba ni zinazotolewa tu kama elimu kwa ujumla na madhumuni ya habari.
text.Use_the_advice_info: Matumizi ya ushauri na habari zilizomo humu ni wakati wako pekee uchaguzi na hatari.
text.rely_on_this_information: Wewe haipaswi kutegemea habari hii kama mbadala kwa ajili ya, wala haina nafasi ya ushauri wa kitaalamu matibabu, utambuzi, au matibabu. Daima kushauriana na daktari wako au mtoa huduma ya afya kabla ya kuanza yoyote ya lishe au mpango wa zoezi.
text.info_without_prior: Kama Wewe kuchagua kutumia habari hii bila kabla ya idhini ya daktari wako, Wewe ni kukubali kukubali jukumu kamili kwa ajili ya maamuzi yako na kukubaliana na kushikilia wapole Kampuni.
text.Service_may_contain_links: Huduma inaweza vyenye viungo vya tovuti ya nje kwamba ni si zinazotolewa au iimarishwe kwa au kwa njia yoyote uhusiano na Kampuni.
text.Company_does_guarantee: Tafadhali kumbuka kuwa Kampuni haina dhamana usahihi, umuhimu, muda, au ukamilifu wa taarifa yoyote juu ya haya tovuti ya nje.
text.Third_party_advertisements: Tatu-party matangazo na viungo kwa tovuti ya tatu chama inaweza pia kuonekana wakati kwa kutumia Huduma. Kampuni haina kufanya yoyote ya uwakilishi kama kwa usahihi au uwepo wa yoyote ya habari zilizomo katika matangazo wale au tovuti na haina kukubali yoyote ya wajibu au dhima kwa ajili ya kufanya au maudhui ya wale matangazo na tovuti na sadaka yaliyotolewa na pande tatu -.
text.links_other_websites: Tatu-party matangazo na viungo na tovuti nyingine ambapo bidhaa au huduma ni kutangazwa si ridhaa au mapendekezo kwa Kampuni ya maeneo ya tatu wa chama, bidhaa au huduma. Kampuni inachukua jukumu hakuna kwa maudhui ya matangazo, ahadi, au ubora/kuegemea ya bidhaa au huduma inayotolewa katika matangazo yote.
text.monetize_and_pay: ili monetize na kulipa kwa ajili ya uendeshaji wa Huduma, Kampuni inaweza kupokea fidia (ama monetarily au kwa njia ya bure ya bidhaa) kwa ajili ya ukaguzi, au endorsement ya kampuni fulani, bidhaa, au huduma.
text.Company_remains_independent: Kampuni bado ni huru na kitaalam ni kufanyika kulingana na Kampuni ya mwenyewe maoni bila kujali fidia ambayo inaweza kupokea.
text.accordance_with_Federal: kwa mujibu wa Shirikisho la Biashara Tume ya sera ya Marekani, makala ambayo yana kampuni, bidhaa au huduma mapitio kwa ajili ya fidia ambayo imepatikana, itakuwa ni pamoja na disclaimer.
text.information_given_Service: habari kutokana na Huduma ni kwa ajili ya mwongozo wa jumla juu ya masuala ya maslahi tu. Hata kama Kampuni inachukua kila tahadhari kuhakikisha kwamba maudhui ya Huduma ni wote sasa na sahihi, makosa yanaweza kutokea. Plus, kutokana na asili ya mabadiliko ya sheria, kanuni na taratibu, kuna inaweza kuwa kuchelewa, omissions au dosari katika taarifa zilizomo kwenye Huduma.
text.responsible_any_errors: Kampuni si kuwajibika kwa makosa yoyote au omissions, au kwa matokeo ya kupatikana kutoka matumizi ya habari hii.
text.Company_may_copyrighted: Kampuni inaweza kutumia nyenzo zenye hakimiliki ambayo ina daima imekuwa hasa mamlaka na mmiliki wa hati miliki. Kampuni ni kufanya kama nyenzo inapatikana kwa ajili ya upinzani, maoni, kuripoti habari, kufundisha, udhamini, au utafiti.
text.Company_believes_constitutes: Kampuni anaamini hii maana ya “matumizi ya haki” ya yoyote kama copyrighted vifaa kama zinazotolewa kwa ajili ya katika sehemu ya 107 ya sheria ya hati Miliki United States.
text.use_copyrighted_material: Kama unataka kutumia copyrighted vifaa kutoka Huduma kwa ajili ya madhumuni yako mwenyewe kwamba kwenda zaidi ya matumizi ya haki, lazima kupata ruhusa kutoka kwa mmiliki wa hati miliki.
text.Service_may_contain_views: Huduma inaweza kuwa na maoni na mawazo ambayo ni yale ya waandishi na si lazima kutafakari sera rasmi au nafasi nyingine yoyote ya mwandishi, shirika la, shirika, mwajiri au kampuni, ikiwa ni pamoja na Kampuni.
text.Company_believes_this_constitutes: Kampuni anaamini hii maana ya “matumizi ya haki” ya yoyote kama copyrighted vifaa kama zinazotolewa kwa ajili ya katika sehemu ya 107 ya sheria ya hati Miliki United States.
text.Comments_published_users: Maoni iliyochapishwa na watumiaji ni wajibu wao pekee na watumiaji kuchukua kamili wajibu, dhima na lawama kwa ajili ya yoyote ya kashfa au madai kwamba matokeo kutoka kitu imeandikwa katika au kama matokeo ya moja kwa moja ya kitu imeandikwa katika maoni. Kampuni si yeye binafsi kwa yoyote ya maoni iliyochapishwa na watumiaji na haki ya kufuta maoni yoyote kwa sababu yoyote ile.
text.Service_provided_with: habari juu Ya Huduma zinazotolewa na ufahamu kwamba Kampuni si humu kushiriki katika utoaji wa kisheria, uhasibu, kodi, au nyingine ushauri wa kitaalamu na huduma. Kama vile, ni lazima kuwa kutumika kama mbadala kwa ajili ya kushauriana na mtaalamu wa uhasibu, kodi, kisheria au nyingine husika washauri.
text.no_event_shall_Company: Katika tukio hilo hakuna mtu Kampuni au wauzaji wake hawahusiki kwa yoyote maalum, muafaka, moja kwa moja, au madhara ya uharibifu wowote unaojitokeza au katika uhusiano na huduma yako au kutumia au kukosa uwezo wa kupata au kutumia Huduma.
text.own_Risk_Disclaimer: Kutumia katika Hatari Yako Mwenyewe Disclaimer
text.info_Service_provided: taarifa Zote katika Huduma zinazotolewa 'kama ni', na hakuna uthibitisho wa ukamilifu, usahihi, muda au wa matokeo ya kupatikana kutoka matumizi ya habari hii, na bila dhamana ya aina yoyote, kujieleza au kumaanisha, ikiwa ni pamoja na, lakini si mdogo na dhamana ya utendaji, uuzaji na ufaaji fulani kusudi.
text.Company_will_liable: Kampuni hawahusiki na Wewe au mtu mwingine yeyote kwa ajili ya yoyote ya uamuzi au hatua zilizochukuliwa katika kujitegemea juu ya habari kutokana na Huduma au kwa ajili ya yoyote ya madhara, maalum au sawa uharibifu, hata kama wanashauriwa ya uwezekano wa uharibifu vile.

text.At_World_Vision: At World Vision, we're sharing a big dream for children. One that moves beyond just clean water or food or health to offer a full solution to poverty.
text.children_have_everything: We want children to have everything they need to thrive, both physically and spiritually, so they can experience the kind of life God intends life in all its fullness.
text.degree_in_design: Bachelor's degree in design, digital art, interaction design or related field or equivalent work experience (eight years).
text.Previous_work_experience: Previous work experience implementing, managing and / or leading within the digital creative field, 8-10 years, preferably in an agency (internal or external) environment.
text.least_years_UX: At least 5 years of UX design as a key, hands-on interaction / visual designer of a UI / UX team through the product development cycle.
text.Expansive_knowledge_layout: Expansive knowledge of layout, typography, mobile technology and web-based graphics and animations, and expert knowledge of design programs including Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, InVision.
text.Motion_design_skills: Motion design skills preferred. A portfolio of sample projects will be requested.
text.degree_design_digital: Bachelor's degree in design, digital art, interaction design or related field or equivalent work experience (eight years).
text.work_experience_implementing: Previous work experience implementing, managing and / or leading within the digital creative field, 8-10 years, preferably in an agency (internal or external) environment.
text.years_UX_design: At least 5 years of UX design as a key, hands-on interaction / visual designer of a UI / UX team through the product development cycle.
text.layout_typography_mobile: Expansive knowledge of layout, typography, mobile technology and web-based graphics and animations, and expert knowledge of design programs including Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, InVision.
text.order_to_apply: In order to apply to this posotion, please send:
text.link_LinkedIn_profile: link to LinkedIn profile (if there is one)
text.Register_want_register: I want to register to the Aimedis health newsletter (optional).
text.Register_Clicking_box: By clicking the box I agree to our terms of use and accept the data collection, data processing and the use of my personal data. More in our privacy policy.
text.Register_clickingbox: By clicking the box I confirm I am a medical professional. I have to provide a proof of my license of practice, which I upload now or provide them later. Before I do not provide that proof I cannot connect to patients.
text.recEmp_Empty_chec: Empty checkmark for Terms or Policy
text.Clicking_the_box: By clicking the box I agree to our terms of use and accept the data collection, data processing and the use of my personal data. More in our privacy policy.
text.Please_select_all: Please select all the ways you would like to hear from Aimedis B.V.
text.You_can_unsubscribe: You can unsubscribe at any time by clicking the link in the footer of our emails. For information about our privacy practices, please visit our website.
text.We_use_Mailchimp: We use Mailchimp as our marketing platform. By clicking below to subscribe, you acknowledge that your information will be transferred to Mailchimp for processing.
text.more_about_Mailchimp: Learn more about mailchimp's privacy practices here.
text.want_to_register: I want to register to the Aimedis health newsletter (optional).
text.I_agree_to_our: By clicking the box I agree to our terms of use and accept the data collection, data processing and the use of my personal data. More in our privacy policy.

text.automatically_hidden_content: A new item is automatically HIDDEN to Doctors & Nurses in case of a regular profile access (PIN & ID) & must manually be made VISIBLE by me (SHOW ALWAYS or SHOW UNTIL A SPECIFIED DATE.)
text.automatically_visible_content: A new item is automatically VISIBLE to Doctors & Nurses in case of a regular profile access (PIN & ID) & must manually be made INVISIBLE by me (HIDE ALWAYS or HIDE UNTIL A SPECIFIED DATE.)
